backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Event, Artist, and UserProfile types with CRUD operations, access-controlled endpoints for user profiles and radar events, and seed data initialization for three techno artists and their events.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three high-confidence features (REQ-67, REQ-68, REQ-69) requiring Dice and Songkick ticket-search buttons on EventCard, ArtistEventPopup, and MyRadarPage, with removal of generic ra.co links.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend file paths to short summaries describing each component's purpose, covering pages, hooks, components, and configuration files for the Techno Beacon app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, card, border, and chart color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Techno Beacon app, loading the React app via main.tsx and setting the page title and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up TanStack Router with routes for Discover, Artists, Artist Detail, and My Radar pages, plus a Layout wrapper with Navigation, footer, ProfileSetupModal, and Toaster.
Admin-only button component that triggers seed data initialization via a mutation, showing success/error states with toast notifications and an 'Admin only' badge.
frontend/src/components/ArtistCard.tsx: Displays an artist card with image, genre, event count, and follow/unfollow toggle button. Clicking the card opens an event popup; a separate button navigates to the artist detail page.
frontend/src/components/ArtistEventPopup: Modal popup that lists upcoming events for a given artist, allowing authenticated users to add/remove events from their radar and open a trip planner. Each event row shows date, venue, source badge, and ticket search link.
frontend/src/components/EventCard.tsx: Card component for a single event showing title, artist name, date/time, location, and source badge, with a radar toggle button and trip planner modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/EventFilters.tsx: Filter bar with inputs for artist name, city, and date range used to narrow down event listings. Displays active filter chips and a clear-all button when filters are applied.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Centered UI prompt shown to unauthenticated users, displaying a title, message, and a login button that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, desktop and mobile nav links (Discover, Artists, My Radar), and auth controls for login/logout using Internet Identity. Shows the user's profile name or truncated principal when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name to set up their profile before accessing the app. Submits the name via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation and blocks interaction until completed.
frontend/src/components/SourceBadge.tsx: A small badge component that displays the event data source (e.g., Resident Advisor, Bandsintown) with source-specific color styling.
frontend/src/components/TripPlannerModal: A modal that helps users plan travel to an event by entering a home city and budget level, then generating Skyscanner and Booking.com links with pre-filled dates and destination.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity state via `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data, including events, artists, user profiles, and tracked artists, wiring each to the actor and identity context.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a dark industrial techno theme with OKLCH color tokens, neon amber/green accent utilities, custom fonts (Space Grotesk/Mono), and keyframe animations for neon glow effects.
frontend/src/lib/eventIdLookup.ts: A static lookup table mapping composite keys of `artistId + dateTime` (nanoseconds) to backend event IDs, with a helper function `getBackendEventId` to retrieve them.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistDetailPage.tsx: Detail page for a single artist showing their profile, follow/unfollow toggle, and a sorted list of upcoming events.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx: Page listing all artists with a search filter, per-artist event counts, and error/loading states with retry support.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Main discovery page displaying upcoming techno events with a hero banner, artist/city/date filters, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MyRadarPage.tsx: Authenticated user page showing tracked artists and saved events with ticket search links to Dice and Songkick.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 page with a pulsing radio icon and a link back to the home route.
frontend/src/utils/ticketSearch.ts: Utility that builds search URLs for Dice and Songkick given a platform name and artist name.
frontend/src/utils/travelLinks.ts: Utility module mapping city names to IATA airport codes and providing helpers to build Skyscanner/Booking.com travel URLs from event data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including neon color palette, Space Grotesk/Mono fonts, box shadows, animations, and plugin imports for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state document for Techno Beacon app tracking version 49, summarizing architecture, known issues (artist data not loading, admin seed data broken), and existing feature inventory.
